title: President Donald J. Trump Prioritizes Historically Black College and Universities – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Education	

Issued on:
February 27, 2018
Established by visionary leaders, America’s HBCUs have long played an integral role in our Nation’s history, providing Black Americans opportunities to learn and achieve their dreams.
						President Donald J. Trump					PRESIDENT DONALD J. TRUMP CONTINUES TO PRIORITIZE HBCUs: With the announcement today, President Donald J. Trump demonstrates his commitment to Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCUs).ADVANCING HCBUs: President Trump has prioritized HBCUs since the beginning of his Administration.
